title: Better Call Saul Presents: Slippin' Jimmy
overview: Set many years before the events of Better Call Saul, Slippin' Jimmy follows the adventures of young Jimmy and Chuck McGill and friends back home in Cicero, Illinois. It is created in the "retro style of Fat Albert" and "each episode nods to everything from spaghetti Westerns to Buster Keaton to After Hours."
